amendment.description: Amendment limits funding for implementing the New START treaty.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 27 printed in House Report 114-112 to limit funding for implementing the New START treaty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 182 (Roll no. 234).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 182 (Roll no. 234).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
